name: Invisibility
description: You target a creature within a very short (5 unit) distance and cause them to become obscured for the next minute. Senses checks to spot this creature cannot use vision and are rolled with a penalty dice. Using an action or reaction other than movement causes this spell to end prematurely. If the target of this spell is spotted, attacks against it are rolled with a penalty dice.
charge: The invisibility effect breaks only at the end of the affected creature's turn if they use an action or reaction that ends the spell.
